channel.title: Erdas Imagine on Arun Gopinath
channel.description: Recent content in Erdas Imagine on Arun Gopinath

item.title: Beginners guide to ERDAS IMAGINE
item.description: During the course period of GIS in kariavattom, we colleagues created a tutorial on Erdas Imagine, a remote sensing tool. The whole project was bounded to the syllabus and are extremely useful. Later I thought it would be beneficial to the beginners if the work is available as a website. If you find this useful share it with your friends. Beginners guide to ERDAS IMAGINE
